reasoning: To filter cards with a normal layout, we need to reference the layout column.
To filter cards with a 2003 frame version, we need to reference the frameVersion column.
To filter cards with a black border color, we need to reference the borderColor column.
To filter cards available in paper, we need to reference the availability column.
To filter cards available in mtgo, we need to reference the availability column.
To retrieve the mana cost of the cards, we need to reference the manaCost column.
